author: Maxim Zaika
comment: Great app but purchase system isn't reliable. I have purchased premium features on my watch and it looks works, while I don't get premium access on my mobile device.  Overall watch is great.  Edit: It takes time to sync with the mobile device, therefore I put 5 stars.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
The sync of the purchase between watch & mobile takes sometimes time, as it is not sync all the time by the Google Play Services. 
To enforce the refresh of the payment of apps, please try the following to see which one will work:
- Reboot the watch/mobile
- Go in the the Google Play Store on your watch/mobile, in the "my apps" category

author: Scott Diestelhorst
comment: Installed guardian and bought the premium never loaded to my watch won't save any presets or load any presets I'll give the programmer some time to figure out what's wrong and get back with me

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Did you install it on your watch? You need to accept the installation on the notification on your watch device. If you missed it or dismissed it, please go in the Google Play store on your watch and search for the watch face. You can send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Iman Salehi
comment: There is a major problem with this watch face. You cannot see the number of unread notifications on the watch face either the active or ambient ones.

author: Mike M
comment: Have to say I am disappointed. Looks exactly to be what I needed with feature rich options but can't set the background to a solid color.

author: Andrey Vasilchenko
comment: Great one! I wish it could properly display the next event though

author: George Zacarias
comment: Would like to be able to customize the info available on ambient screen a i.e. disable digital

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Send me an email with your request to thema.apps@gmail.com;)

author: Lukasz Rojowiec
comment: Exactly what I was looking. Has everything I wanted and it looks great!

author: Mark Young
comment: Nice!  Easy to see and configure!

author: BRIAN-MATHEW Els
comment: Face looks awesome but how do put the face on the gear

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

comment: So far I like this.  Very customizable especially with the Android companion app (must also download the app to your phone). I have to see the battery life but the options are great.  Also posting that video is very helpful! I bought the premium (using LG Watch Style).

author: Alexander Kelly
comment: Very visually appealing and customizable functionality of shortcuts and widgets are seamless all around a great watch face however I've noticed that once choosing a widget for the complication (2.0) setting you cannot change it to something else which is a bit annoying if anyone has some insight on this it would be most pleasant... cannot change COMPLICATION (2.0 WEAR) WIDGETS

author: Saad Gabuna
comment: if you love customization, you're only limited by your imagination. All sorts of ways to create and save faces from casual to professional settings. Highly recommended and it costs less than a coffee

author: RaR0inb0x
comment: Nailed it. Works as it should. Works on the huwaei 1 watch. Looks really epic

author: S D Carey
comment: Really creative arrangement of information. I really like the options on premium version.

author: Jordan Clark
comment: Incredible design. Pretty awesome and works for me on a daily.

author: Dan Cardinale
comment: Another nice watch face. Thank you!

author: Han Sheng Ler
comment: Great interface.
Good but can be better.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Your rating is quite hard for something good ;) do you have any issue associated to this rating? Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Scott Bruck
comment: Awesome design

author: Simon Neale
comment: I've only had my Smartwatch 2 for a week, and, as you do, I've tried loads of watch faces. This is the only one that I've paid the premium features on! It looks great, fills the screen nicely, and just had (even on the free version) a premium look and feel. I bought the Dev some cheese!

author: Shaun Double
comment: Like the face but I paid for premium and in the phone it shows premium but on the watch it is not premium. Thanks that resolved the issue, odd as other watch faces are synched instantly.  Any chance of a complication displaying watch and mobile battery in one? I have it in other faces but don't see an option here.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Concerning the sync of your purchase on mobile/watch, it seems that the stores of your two devices are not sync.
There are different ways to enforce the refresh of the payment of apps, please try the following :
- Reboot the mobile/watch
- Go in the the Google Play Store on your mobile/watch, in the "my apps" category
The sync should be done.

author: CARL os
comment: Great little app that works well with my fossil watch and gives you the options to make it look the way you want it, the only down side is that you will probably need to buy premium to really make it look it's best.

author: Steven Yanni
comment: Do I have to buy premium again if I change my phone ?

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Non, si vous gardez le même compte Google l'achat sera garde

author: Buster Brown
comment: My new fave. Easy to read. Does loads of things.

author: stephan reynolds
comment: Did not work

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Can you send me some details about your issue by email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Pé no Blues
comment: Lets try this first!

author: Brian Lemly
comment: Well, I truly love this watch face, but I'm recent months it has been completely unable to sync with Google Fit despite multiple reinstalls and checking all permissions. It's a 5/5 app except for these issues.

author: Chris Hoopes
comment: This has already become my favorite watch face. It's full of features that are easy to set up. I'm a big fan of many of these watch faces.

author: Brant Gluth
comment: Purchased the premium version, really like the ability to access apps directly from the main watch face. Very handy and easy to use

author: E. Ironbar
comment: Pretty cool face. The free version is just fine but I may purchase the premium just to show support.

author: Rohn Sanchez
comment: Great watch face. Upgraded to premium and love the features. Highly recommend.

author: David Barrow
comment: Great watch face. Lots of customisation

author: Alan Deloughry
comment: Does what it says

author: Dalewn Loewn
comment: Nice watch faces

author: Johnny Vasquez
comment: Nice

author: elad friedberg
comment: Looks good, I like the shortcuts and everything. BUT one thing... WHY is impossible to turn off the digital watch?? For the developer, make the option to turn the digital watch off. And you will de my hero..

author: Damien Gerard
comment: This watch face is one of the better ones but it shows that I have an unread sms when I actually do not. I have checked and double checked my sms app but the watch face still shows one unread sms.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. The sms count only works if you are using the stock sms reader of your mobile. Hit the widget to see what are the unread messages, and try to read them on your mobile with the default app

author: Ajay John
comment: This developer has a great variety of innovate watch faces and this one is no exception. A sharp clean face which shows a good deal of information!  - bbb

author: Brandon Partridge
comment: Fantastic watchface. I haven't found a way to remove the litter digits yet but hopefully that comes in the future. Rule_Two_

author: Glen Picadash
comment: Beautiful watch face with a ton of options. I only wish you could choose a picture for the background. Like a gallery image, etc
